Diapause in Heteroptera
Project
View
The Mecocephala group revisited: Phylogeny, economic importance and modeling of species distribution (Hemiptera: Pentatomidae: Carpocorini)
Project
Using phylogenetic methods, test the limits of the Mecocephala group, to propose the relations of between the genera studied based on morphological data and to review the taxonomy of selected genera. Depending on the distribution and diversity, from the results obtained in the phylogenetic analysis, to study the distribution and the pest potential of selected species. Provide a dichotomous key for the identification of the genera of the Mecocephala group and to relate the food plants used by the species of the group.
View
Phylogeny and revision of Agroecus Dallas, 1851 (Hemiptera: Pentatomidae)
Project
Inferring the phylogenetic relationships of the genus Agroecus. Revision and redescription of species with emphasis on the morphology of genitalia.
